name: freelancer
title: Freelancer
author: Start Bootstrap (Freelancer), forked and extended by domsob

replacement.name: Max Mustermann
replacement.meCol1: Whether you're a student looking to showcase your work, a professional looking to attract clients, or a graphic artist looking to share your projects, this template is the perfect starting point!
replacement.meCol2: Whether you're a student looking to showcase your work, a professional looking to attract clients, or a graphic artist looking to share your projects, this template is the perfect starting point!
replacement.skillDescription1: Fähigkeit 1: Freelancer is a free bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap. The download includes the complete source files including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as optional LESS stylesheets for easy customization.
replacement.skillDescription2: Fähigkeit 2: Freelancer is a free bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap. The download includes the complete source files including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as optional LESS stylesheets for easy customization.
